metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17471 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Incorrect dialog placement in WebContents in Google Chrome prior to70.0.3538.67 allowed a remote attacker to obscure the full screen warningvia a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
